Posts.Content: twoyoung wrote: Hi All, I have been having hip/pelvic pain.  I am a 6 year BC Stage 2 survivor.  My PET results showed diffuse heterogeneous activity throughout the spine, pelvis, and proximal femurs and suggested an MRI to rule out metastatic disease.  So, I have an MRI this weekend.  Anyone else ever have PET results like this?  This is my first scan and I guess I was thinking I would get the news, no cancer or cancer.... Just wondering if anyone else has had a similar situation. Thanks! Chris Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: PET Scan twoyoung twoyoung
